DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate contribution internal familial resource development motherhood population mother preterm twin infant compare population population mother give birth single ( twin ) full term infant .
DOC.brief_title: Internal Familial Resources Motherhood . Follow Up Mothers With Twins Preterm Infants Versus Mothers With Single Full Term Infants
DOC.detailed_description: 150 mother participate study . The study use 4 questionnaire infant age 1 month , 1 year , 2 year 4 year . The questionnaire involve communication skill , grandparent support , stress feeling , psychological parameter , parity functioning , infant temperament , self assessment , maternal infant medical background twin brotherhood evaluation . comparison do mother preterm twin mother single full term infant .
